title: Barbecued veggie ciabatta sandwich
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons mayonnaise', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 red pepper, sliced', '1 small courgette, sliced', '1 red onion, sliced', '2 pattypan squashes, sliced', '4 individual ciabattas, split horizontally', '100g (4 oz) feta cheese, crumbled']
